Name: SubnetRouteTableAssociation
Documentation: Associates a subnet with a route table.

Parameters.Name: RouteTableId
Parameters.Documentation: The ID of the route table. This is commonly written as a reference to a route table declared elsewhere in the template. For example:

Parameters.Name: SubnetId
Parameters.Documentation: The ID of the subnet. This is commonly written as a reference to a subnet declared elsewhere in the template. For example:
